results.name: A077028 * A000012, that is Rascal's triangle (as matrix) multiplied by a lower triangular matrix of ones (main diagonal of ones included).
formula: A077028 * A000012 as infinite lower triangular matrices. Triangle read by rows, partial sums starting from the right of A077028.
example: First few rows of the triangle are;
mathematica: MB = Table[Boole[0 <= k <= n], {n, 0, rows-1}, {k, 0, rows -1}];
Table[T[[n, k]], {n, 1, rows}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 01 2020 *)
